bibliographic-data.invention-title: MAP DISPLAY SYSTEM AND MAP DISPLAY METHOD

abstract.p: A map display system includes a search section searching for a reference point where a map has not changed for approximately the same period as a period during which a map or a landscape of a base point has not changed, and a display section displaying information which represents the searched reference point. Further, a map display method includes searching for a reference point where a map has not changed for approximately the same period as a period during which a map or a landscape of a base point has not changed, and displaying information which represents the searched reference point.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Map display system and map display method

abstract.p: The present invention relates to a map display system and a map display method. A map display system according to the present invention includes: a search section searching for a reference point where a map has not changed for approximately the same period as a period during which a map or a landscape of a base point has not changed

and a display section displaying information which represents the searched reference point. Further, a map display method according to the present invention includes: searching for a reference point where a map has not changed for approximately the same period as a period during which a map or a landscape of a base point has not changed

and displaying information which represents the searched reference point. A map display method in a mobile device according to the present invention includes the steps of: transmitting at least one of a reference image representing a landscape of a base point and positional information of the base point
receiving a search result of a reference point where a map has not changed for approximately the same period as a period during which the base point has not changed
and displaying information which represents the searched reference point.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: MAP DISPLAY SYSTEM AND MAP DISPLAY METHOD

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a map display system and a map display method enabling a user to easily find age-old buildings and a cityscape.

SOLUTION: A camera 10, after a subject such as a building 11 is photographed thereby, transmits, together with the picture of the building 11, the information (GPS information) on the photographic position 31 to a server 20. A change determination section 7 of the server 20 retrieves the map of the photographic position 31 or a reference point 32 whose map has not changed for approximately the same period as the period wherein the landscape has not been changed, and transmits the mapped information representing the reference point 32 to the camera 10. The camera 10 displays the received mapped information on a display section 10a.
